description: For n >= 0, let E_n be the set of exponents in expression of 2*n as a sum of distinct powers of 2 (2*n = Sum_{e in E_n} 2^e); a(n) = number of distinct values taken by the expression Sum_{e in E_n} s(e)*2^e when s runs over all functions from the positive numbers to the set { +1, -1 }.
